relations.target: one: used of a single unit or thing; not two or more; '`ane' is Scottish' <i12006>
hole: one playing period (from tee to green) on a golf course; 'he played 18 holes' <i54851>
play: (game) the activity of doing something in an agreed succession; 'it is my turn'; 'it is still my play' <i37819>

senses.definition: a play in golf where the hole is completed in a single stroke
